title: ComfortStyle Replacement Seat Cushion Upholstery Foam Pad for Sofa or Dining Chair, 3" x 24" x 82" CertiPUR-US Certified, Extra Long
features: PROFESSIONAL GRADE - Whether you are replacing the worn out padding on a sofa, the sagging seat cushion on a chair, or just need an extra sleeping pad around the house, use the foam the pros use. We have been selling our foam to professional furniture and bed makers for 34 years, and now it's available to you
LONG LASTING - This 1.85 lb. high density foam will last 7-10 years, and with a 36 lb. ILD compression rating it has the perfect amount of firmness for optimal comfort and support

ECO-FRIENDLY - Our foam is certified by CertiPUR-US meaning that it meets rigorous standards for emissions, content, performance, and durability. It is also made without any ozone depleters such as PBDEs, TDCPP, or TCEP, and is MADE IN THE USA
EXTRA LONG SHEET - We cut our foam 82" long making it long enough to fit most sofas and beds.
3" THICK - Our 3" foam is ideal for projects such as ottomans, benches, dining chairs, stools, pillow backs, and anything else where a softer surface is preferred
description: We have been in the commercial foam business for 34 years. As such, we know quality foam and refuse to sell anything but the best. Our customers use our foam for everything from seat cushion replacements and arm foam to dining chair pads. All of our foam is CertiPUR-US certified meaning that you can rest easy knowing that our foam is eco-friendly and safe for you and your loved ones.
